reviewText:
As one who was a former student of Master Lee, this tape was excellent in explaining the mechanics behind each technique.  The demonstrations of the warm-up exercises do benefits the practitioners of those executing each technique and those receiving the techniques. The warm-ups are specifically designed to aid in the various techniques demonstrated to prevent injury.  Alhough injuries can and do happen in this sport, the warm-ups demonstrated are essential.  One can use these tapes as a private class taught by Master Lee.  From joint locks, take downs to round and front snap kicks, these dvds were an excellent investment.

CBlake
